title: Episode 220 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Primary source for episode metadata including title, air dates, plot summary, TV ratings (11.2%), production credits (screenplay by Junki Takegami, directed by Munehisa Sakai, animation by Eisaku Inoue), and character debuts (Drim and Noko)

title: Ocean's Dream Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Comprehensive information about the Ocean's Dream Arc (episodes 220-224), including plot overview, connection to PlayStation game 'One Piece: Ocean's Dream!', and detailed character information

title: Noko - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Detailed character information for Noko including physical appearance (orange body with red stars, blue eyes that glow red), abilities (memory theft, hypnosis, illusions), motivation to become a Sennenryu dragon, and voice actors (Keiichi Sonobe JP, Cris George EN)

title: Drim - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character information for Drim including physical appearance (short with droopy eyes, lavender hair, yellow hat), role as antagonist under Noko's hypnotic control, personality when hypnotized vs. freed, and voice actors (Chinami Nishimura JP, Mary Morgan EN)

title: One Piece "Ocean's Dream" 220-226
author: grimCONvenience
notes: Critical review of the Ocean's Dream Arc with detailed plot analysis. Provides information about memory loss effects on each character, plot inconsistencies, and connection to Millennium Dragon lore. Negative overall assessment recommending skipping the arc.

title: One Piece: Ocean's Dream Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Blog
notes: Comprehensive recap and review rating the arc 7/10. Praises the premise as clever and original, noting it brings laughs and unique character moments while lacking depth of main story. Useful for understanding fan reception.

title: One Piece: 15 Anime Arcs You Can Skip
author: GameRant
notes: Guide to skippable One Piece arcs. Lists Ocean's Dream Arc as skippable, describing it as a tonal disruption lacking character development, making it a must-skip for first-time watchers.

title: One Piece Filler Episodes and Arcs You Can Skip
author: CBR
notes: Comprehensive filler guide describing Ocean's Dream Arc as a fun detour with mostly mild entertainment. Notes it as pure filler that might be time wasted for some viewers.

title: 10 Best 'One Piece' Filler Arcs You Shouldn't Skip
author: FandomWire
notes: Positive assessment of Ocean's Dream Arc as a short and intriguing filler using memory loss to show character development. Notes it's based on a video game and provides pure entertainment and nostalgia.

title: Noko Voice - One Piece (TV Show)
author: Behind The Voice Actors
notes: Voice actor database confirming Cris George (English) and Keiichi Sonobe (Japanese) as Noko's voice actors

title: Drim Voice - One Piece (TV Show)
author: Behind The Voice Actors
notes: Voice actor database confirming Mary Morgan (English) and Chinami Nishimura (Japanese) as Drim's voice actors

title: One Piece Filler List & Episode to Chapter Conversion Guide 2025
author: Anime Filler Guide
notes: Comprehensive database confirming episodes 220-224 as filler episodes making up the Ocean's Dream Arc

Sabat - Zoro, Luci Christian - Nami, Sonny Strait - Usopp, Eric Vale - Sanji, Brina Palencia - Chopper, Stephanie Young - Robin)
